about_the_game:
After dying in a car accident, you are reborn in a bar and welcomed by the bartender. 

But as mysterious as the situation is, the bartender has nothing to hide. Rather, they're eager to serve you the best drinks and answer to any questions you may have.

Unforgettable is a game about crafting drinks and talking. But you're not talking to anyone, you're talking to someone who knows virtually everything. In Unforgettable, your actions shape the conversation as you try to undestand the situation you're in, or not.

The bartender has infinite time to spend and many things to tell, and you have a lot of questions to ask and drinks to try!

  • Unforgettable is a visual novel game where you play as the first customer of a mysterious bar.

  • During the game, you'll engage in conversations with the bartender to better understand the strange situation you're in. You'll have multiple choices during dialogues, allowing you to guide the conversation by asking questions or contributing to it in general.

  • You'll also be served drinks throughout the game. The bartender prepares the drinks, but you, the player, control the preparation process.

  • The drinks you order and how well you prepare them will also influence the conversation.

  • The dialogue is based on a knowledge system, where the information you discover might unlock new dialogue options in the future.

  • The game's narrative leaves many questions unanswered, encouraging players to theorize possible answers. For this purpose, a knowledge menu is available in the game, allowing you to track all the information you've acquired through your playthroughs.

  • The game has six possible endings. But the story doesn't end here—there might be more games set in the same universe on the way.
